name: AI_Takedown
description:
This is an early access prototype build for a fast paced rougelike shooter where the faster you move the more your rewards. 

Version 0.0.1

Currently in game:

  • Shooting mechanics
  • Point system
  • Procedurally generated levels
  • Horde mode
    • Minor environmental hazard
  • 3 useable weapons
  • Settings 

Planned for next release:

  • More refined Procedural generation system
  • More weapons
  • Abilities
  • Shop
  • Carryover between levels
    • Weapons
    • Armor
    • Health
    • Cash

And if you want to help support development to turn this fledgling project into a fully finished game please consider joining my Patreon here!

Last bit to note: Most if not all current assets being used are simply placeholders and do not remotely resemble the artistic route the game is planned to take.
